USE_AUTH.description: Enable or disable password protection on production.

USE_AUTO_STORE_DATA.description: Automatically store form data and send to all views

USE_COOKIE_SESSION_STORE.description:
Enable cookie-based session store (persists on restart)
Please note 4KB cookie limit per domain, cookies too large will silently be ignored.

USE_HTTPS.description: Force HTTP to redirect to HTTPS on production
